body: Just encountered same issue. Sometimes "runtime/cgo: out of memory in thread_start" (Go 1.5) and sometimes "fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution" (Go 1.5.1). Thanks to the comments here, I reverted to Go 1.4.2 and it became stable. A library DOES use CGO. It would crash about the 3 GB mark on 32 GB Linux AMD64 machines, both inside and outside of Docker containers.
